version_description:
√ Buy both Individual Travel and Periodic Travel within Zone Bergen
√ Buy Youth Travel (age of 16 - 19 years) for use in the whole of Hordaland County
√ New side menu navigation
√ Fully compatible with iOS7
√ Notifications when tickets and credit cards expires

Small bug fix

√ Buy both Individual Travel and Periodic Travel within Zone Bergen
√ Buy Youth Travel (age of 16 - 19 years) for use in the whole of Hordaland County
√ New side menu navigation
√ Fully compatible with iOS7
√ Notifications when tickets and credit cards expires

Small bug fix

- Minor bugfixes
- iOS8 Support

- Minor bugfixes
- iOS8 Support

- Brand new design, with a cleaner and more modern look.
- Single tickets for dogs and bikes; 24h tickets for adults, children and seniors.
- 30 days youth ticket is now not personal, like all other season tickets.
- To avoid people purchasing their ticket just before an inspection we have added a 2 minute countdown, before the ticket is activated. You can still enter the vehicle while the ticket is in countdown-mode.
- Shortcut to purchase expired tickets again have been added.

- Brand new design, with a cleaner and more modern look.
- Single tickets for dogs and bikes; 24h tickets for adults, children and seniors.
- 30 days youth ticket is now not personal, like all other season tickets.
- To avoid people purchasing their ticket just before an inspection we have added a 2 minute countdown, before the ticket is activated. You can still enter the vehicle while the ticket is in countdown-mode.
- Shortcut to purchase expired tickets again have been added.

- Correct VAT-percentage is shown in the ticket
- Bugfixes and stability improvements

- Correct VAT-percentage is shown in the ticket
- Bugfixes and stability improvements
Removed a bug which prevented users on iOS 8 or older from refilling the mobile account.
Removed a bug which prevented users on iOS 8 or older from refilling the mobile account.
Updates on voice over mode
Updates on voice over mode

- Text update

Support for nynorsk. Improvements and bugfixes.

- Upgraded user interface.
- Better support for latest iOS version and iPhone X.
- Setting for automatic receipt by email.
Support for nynorsk. Improvements and bugfixes.

- Upgraded user interface.

- Bug fixes and improvements.

- Bug Fixes and improvements
- Bug Fixes and improvements

* Fixed issue with wrong currency displayed for international users.
* Fixed issue for some iOS 13 devices causing total price not to show on the payment button.
* Fixed issue on settings screen where some values were misplaced on iOS 13 devices.

* Fixed issue with wrong currency displayed for international users.
* Fixed issue for some iOS 13 devices causing total price not to show on the payment button.
* Fixed issue on settings screen where some values were misplaced on iOS 13 devices.

This version brings the following fixes and improvements:

* Fixed an issue where Vipps payments would not work on iOS 13 devices.

This version brings the following fixes and improvements:

* Fixed an issue where Vipps payments would not work on iOS 13 devices.

Denne versjonen har følgende forbedringer og fikser:

* Utløpte bankkort vil nå bli markert riktig.
* Visning av telefonnummer for bruker og versjonsnummer for appen lagt til under innstillinger.
* Haptisk tilbakemelding lagt til.
* Mindre forbedringer i kartvelger.
* Forbedret stabilitet under betaling i eksterne applikasjoner.

* Forbedret stabilitet under betaling i eksterne applikasjoner.
